plugins.name: Variables2Sheets
plugins.description:
🇺🇸 English Description (🇰🇷 한국어 설명은 아래에 있습니다.)

Variables2Sheets - Complete Figma Variables Management Solution 🌟

Transform your Figma workflow with Variables2Sheets, the comprehensive plugin for managing design variables through spreadsheets. From simple exports to complete design system maintenance, streamline your variable management process with powerful features designed for modern design teams.


✨ What's New - Major Update

Now supporting ALL Figma variable types with enhanced functionality:


🎯 Complete Variable Type Support

  1. String - Text content and multi-language management
  2. Color - Color system and palette management
  3. Number - Spacing, sizing, and numeric values
  4. Boolean - State management (true/false)


🔗 Alias Support

  1. String, Color, Number, Boolean Alias fully supported
  2. Manage complex variable reference relationships effortlessly
  3. Advanced feature for actual value resolution


🔄 Advanced Collection Management

  1. Move variables between collections directly from spreadsheets
  2. Auto-create new collections when needed
  3. Reorganize your design system structure effortlessly


🌐 Multi-Language Interface

  1. Korean language support for local teams
  2. Perfect for global design teams and CMS workflows
  3. Additional languages coming soon


🎨 Enhanced User Experience

  1. System theme support (Dark/Light mode)
  2. Auto-refresh collections
  3. Streamlined interface for better productivity


🚀 Key Features

  1. Export to CSV/JSON formats
  2. Import edited variables back to Figma
  3. Copy variables directly to clipboard for Google Sheets
  4. Choose specific collections to export
  5. Seamless cross-project variable management


User Guide: https://nine0109.github.io/note/Public/2025-05-25_variables2sheets_guide


Perfect for design system managers, content teams, and anyone working with complex variable structures in Figma. Experience the evolution from a simple export tool to a complete variables management solution.


----------------


🇰🇷 한국어 설명

Variables2Sheets - 완벽한 Figma Variables 관리 솔루션 🌟

Figma Variables를 스프레드시트로 관리하는 완전한 솔루션입니다. 단순한 내보내기부터 복잡한 디자인 시스템 관리까지, 현대적인 디자인 팀을 위한 강력한 기능을 제공합니다.


✨ 주요 업데이트

모든 Figma Variable 타입을 지원하는 향상된 기능:


🎯 완벽한 Variable 타입 지원

  1. String - 텍스트 콘텐츠 및 다국어 관리
  2. Color - 컬러 시스템 및 팔레트 관리
  3. Number - 간격, 크기 및 숫자 값
  4. Boolean - 상태 관리 (true/false)


🔗 별칭(Alias) 지원

  1. String, Color, Number, Boolean Alias 지원
  2. 복잡한 Variable 참조 관계도 손쉽게 관리
  3. 고급 기능을 사용한 실제 값 변환 표시


🔄 고급 컬렉션 관리

  1. 스프레드시트에서 컬렉션 간 Variables 이동
  2. 필요시 새 컬렉션 자동 생성
  3. 디자인 시스템 구조를 손쉽게 재정리


🌐 다국어 인터페이스

  1. 한국어 지원으로 로컬 팀 친화적
  2. 글로벌 디자인 팀과 CMS 워크플로우에 최적
  3. 추가 언어 지원 예정


🎨 향상된 사용자 경험

  1. 시스템 테마 지원 (다크/라이트 모드)
  2. 컬렉션 자동 새로고침
  3. 생산성을 위한 간소화된 인터페이스


🚀 핵심 기능

  1. CSV/JSON 형식으로 내보내기
  2. 편집된 Variables를 Figma로 다시 가져오기
  3. 클립보드로 직접 복사하여 Google Sheets에 붙여넣기
  4. 특정 컬렉션 선택 내보내기
  5. 프로젝트 간 Variable 관리


사용법 가이드: https://nine0109.github.io/note/Public/2025-05-25_variables2sheets_guide

디자인 시스템 관리자, 콘텐츠 팀, 복잡한 Variable 구조를 다루는 모든 분들에게 완벽한 솔루션입니다.
plugins.tagline: Manage Figma variables in spreadsheets

plugins.description:
Random Gradient Fill + Emoji


Add some magic to your designs with random gradients and fun emojis! ✨


How to use


🎨 Gradient Fill

1. Select any shapes or frames

2. Choose your preferred angle

3. Click "Apply Random Gradient"

4. Each selection gets a unique gradient!


😊 Random Emoji

1. Select any text layers

2. Click "Random Emoji ✨"

3. Watch your text transform into fun emojis!


Tips

- Select multiple elements to apply different gradients at once

- Mix and match gradients with different angles

- Use emojis to add quick expressions or icons to your designs

- Experiment with different combinations for unique results


Made with ❤️ by Maple

plugins.name: Style Manager for Tableau
plugins.description:
Import your Tableau Preferences.tps file to manage your colour palettes visually rather than editing XML.


  1. Merge Preference files
  2. Add palettes from hex codes
  3. Edit palettes
  4. Reorganise palettes
  5. Add standard palettes like viridis and turbo with the click of a button
  6. Add the palettes to your Figma design to make sure the colours align
  7. Automatically create Figma colour variables


Once you are done, export the Preferences.tps file to bring it back into Tableau.

Replace with Component Instance is a simple Figma plugin that lets you select multiple frames and replace them all at once with instances of a chosen component. This tool saves time and ensures consistency by automating the process of updating repeated elements.

  1. Select the Frames: Choose the frames you want to replace.
  2. Run the Plugin: Right-click, go to Plugins ➔ Replace with Component ➔ Replace with Component.
  3. Select the Component: Pick the component you want to use from the list.


Viola!

plugins.description:

By accepting a string of text separated by line breaks, the plugin creates instances of the selected component.


This is suitable if you have many component instances to create or edit, and you don't want to go one-by-one editing each individually.


You can also replace text in selected instances and specify which variable you wish to replace.


This workflow reduces context switching and dramatically speeds up efficiency for designers while adding content to their components instances.

plugins.name: 图片导出助手 image Export Assistant
plugins.description:
Introduction

The Image Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline and organize the process of exporting images for multiple platforms. Whether you're working on iOS, Android, or Web projects, this plugin ensures your assets are perfectly scaled and neatly categorized.


Function Description

  1. Preset Configurations: Choose from predefined presets for iOS, Android, or Web to automatically set up export scales, prefixes, and suffixes.
  2. Multiple Formats: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  3. Organized Folder Structure: Utilize prefixes to automatically create folder structures within ZIP archives, ensuring your exports are well-organized.
  4. Customizable Export Options: Add, modify, or delete export configurations to suit your specific project needs.
  5. Efficient Workflow: Save time by managing all your export settings in one place, reducing repetitive tasks and minimizing errors.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: Choose one or more elements in your Figma project that you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Navigate to Plugins > Image Export Assistant > Export.
  3. Choose Preset: Click on a preset button (iOS, Android, or Web) to automatically configure export settings, or manually adjust scales, prefixes, and suffixes as needed.
  4. Select Format: Choose your desired export format from the dropdown menu (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, WEBP).
  5. Export: Click the Export button to generate and download a ZIP file containing your organized exports.


Notes

  1. Prefix Formatting: Ensure that prefixes end with a / to create proper folder structures within the ZIP archive.
  2. Browser Compatibility: Some formats like WEBP require browser support for Canvas toDataURL conversions.
  3. ZIP Archives: The plugin always generates a ZIP file, even for single exports, to maintain consistency and organization.
  4. Logging: Detailed logs are available in the developer console to help troubleshoot any issues during the export process.


介绍

图片导出助手是一款功能强大的Figma插件，旨在简化和组织多平台图像导出的过程。无论您是为iOS、Android还是Web项目工作，此插件都能确保您的资产完美缩放并整齐分类。


功能说明

  1. 预设配置： 选择iOS、Android或Web预设，自动设置导出倍数、前缀和后缀。
  2. 多种格式： 支持将设计导出为PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF和WEBP等多种格式。
  3. 有序的文件夹结构： 利用前缀自动在ZIP归档中创建文件夹结构，确保导出内容井然有序。
  4. 自定义导出选项： 添加、修改或删除导出配置，以满足您的特定项目需求。
  5. 高效工作流程： 在一个地方管理所有导出设置，节省时间，减少重复任务并降低错误率。


使用方法

  1. 选择元素： 在Figma项目中选择一个或多个您希望导出的元素。
  2. 运行插件： 导航至 Plugins > 图片导出助手 > Export。
  3. 选择预设： 点击预设按钮（iOS、Android或Web），自动配置导出设置，或根据需要手动调整倍数、前缀和后缀。
  4. 选择格式： 从下拉菜单中选择您需要的导出格式（PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF、WEBP）。
  5. 导出： 点击导出按钮，生成并下载包含您有序导出的ZIP文件。


注意事项

  1. 前缀格式： 确保前缀以/结尾，以在ZIP归档中创建正确的文件夹结构。

113081.name: 图片导出助手 image Export Assistant
113081.description:
Introduction

The Image Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline and organize the process of exporting images for multiple platforms. Whether you're working on iOS, Android, or Web projects, this plugin ensures your assets are perfectly scaled and neatly categorized.


Function Description

  1. Preset Configurations: Choose from predefined presets for iOS, Android, or Web to automatically set up export scales, prefixes, and suffixes.
  2. Multiple Formats: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  3. Organized Folder Structure: Utilize prefixes to automatically create folder structures within ZIP archives, ensuring your exports are well-organized.
  4. Customizable Export Options: Add, modify, or delete export configurations to suit your specific project needs.
  5. Efficient Workflow: Save time by managing all your export settings in one place, reducing repetitive tasks and minimizing errors.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: Choose one or more elements in your Figma project that you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Navigate to Plugins > Image Export Assistant > Export.
  3. Choose Preset: Click on a preset button (iOS, Android, or Web) to automatically configure export settings, or manually adjust scales, prefixes, and suffixes as needed.
  4. Select Format: Choose your desired export format from the dropdown menu (PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, WEBP).
  5. Export: Click the Export button to generate and download a ZIP file containing your organized exports.


Notes

  1. Prefix Formatting: Ensure that prefixes end with a / to create proper folder structures within the ZIP archive.
  2. Browser Compatibility: Some formats like WEBP require browser support for Canvas toDataURL conversions.
  3. ZIP Archives: The plugin always generates a ZIP file, even for single exports, to maintain consistency and organization.
  4. Logging: Detailed logs are available in the developer console to help troubleshoot any issues during the export process.


介绍

图片导出助手是一款功能强大的Figma插件，旨在简化和组织多平台图像导出的过程。无论您是为iOS、Android还是Web项目工作，此插件都能确保您的资产完美缩放并整齐分类。

plugins.name: ColorCheck WCAG
plugins.description:
ColorCheck WCAG es un plugin minimalista y funcional diseñado para facilitar a diseñadores y desarrolladores la verificación de contrastes de colores de acuerdo con las pautas WCAG. Esta herramienta MVP te permite probar combinaciones de colores de fondo y texto para garantizar accesibilidad y cumplir con estándares de diseño inclusivo.


Características Clave

  1. ✅ Cálculo de Índice de Contraste: Evalúa rápidamente los niveles A, AA y AAA de contraste según WCAG 2.1.
  2. 🎨 Selector de Colores Intuitivo: Configura fácilmente el color de fondo y texto con selectores HEX y visores dinámicos.
  3. 💡 Resultados Claros: Obtén información inmediata sobre el cumplimiento de cada nivel con una interfaz limpia y amigable.


¿Cómo Funciona?

  1. Selecciona tus colores: Ingresa o selecciona un color de fondo y un color de texto desde el selector integrado.
  2. Revisa el contraste: Visualiza el índice de contraste y verifica si cumple con los niveles A, AA o AAA de accesibilidad.
  3. Itera tus combinaciones: Ajusta colores para lograr resultados óptimos en segundos.


🚀 Tu Feedback es Importante

ColorCheck WCAG es un MVP en constante evolución, ¡quiero saber qué necesitas! ¿Qué funcionalidades adicionales te gustaría ver? Deja tus comentarios y recomendaciones para ayudarme a mejorar en las próximas versiones.
plugins.tagline: ColorCheck WCAG: Optimiza la accesibilidad de colores para experiencias inclusivas y efectivas.

plugins.name: Decision Trackr
plugins.description:
No more meetings to debate decisions that have been made already.


Decision Trackr is a plugin that helps design teams capture, document, and review critical design decisions directly within their Figma projects. Select an element, log a decision and maintain a chronological version history of decisions made per element.


How to use it:

  1. Select the element to attach to your decision.
  2. Enter the decision and a reason.
  3. Add decision makers.
  4. Log your decision! 🚀


A decision history page is created and all decisions are properly versioned and link directly to the element relating to the decision.


Key Features:


Link Decisions to Elements: Decision Trackr lets users attach design decisions directly to elements within a Figma file. This makes it easy to understand the rationale behind each design component and offers context to anyone viewing the file.


Decision History and Versioning: Each decision can be updated and versioned, providing a chronological record of changes and their respective contexts. This historical view is invaluable for teams who may revisit past iterations or need to understand how and why certain design choices were made.


Decision ownership: Tag each decision with attendees or decision-maker's names. Each name is recorded and assigned to a decision. When ownership of a decision is clear, design jams become a place for robust and productive debate.


This plugin is a must-have for teams who like to own their work, make clear decisions and talk about the right things in meetings. No more meetings to debate decisions that have been made already.

accepted.name: Nic Haralambous
accepted.description: product builder, obsessive entrepreneur.

plugins.tagline: Quickly log, review, and manage design decisions within your Figma files.

plugins.name: Lorem Ipsum Maker (free)
plugins.description:
Add Lorem Ipsum text to your designs to test out layouts!


Lorem Ipsum Maker is a super simple Figma Plugin: choose the settings for your lorem ipsum text, and add it to your designs to better view out your page or frame layout adjusts to it.


👋🏻 First things first:

  1. 100% free: no payment or fees required
  2. All the Lorem Ipsum text is free of any copyright or trademarks


💬 Choose the type of Lorem Ipsum text:

Supports three different versions of Lorem Ipsum text:

  1. Words
  2. Sentences
  3. Paragraphs


Choose the Lorem Ipsum type that is best suited to what you're trying to test.


📏 Choose your Lorem Ipsum length:

  1. Use the slider to customize how many Lorem Ipsum words, sentences and/or paragraphs you want added to the page
  2. Choose the number of words that appear in each sentence
  3. Choose the number of sentences that appear in each paragraph


🤔 More:

  1. Copy the Lorem Ipsum text to your clipboard
  2. Re-generate different random Lorem Ipsum text, or
  3. Insert the Lorem Ipsum text right into your designs


🔗 References:

plugins.name: Pictoria
plugins.description:
Unlock Your Creative Potential with Our Figma Plugin!

Transform Your Designs with GIFs, Images, and AI!


Elevate your design process with our all-in-one Figma plugin that seamlessly integrates Giphy, Unsplash, and OpenAI. Whether you're a UI/UX designer, marketer, or creative professional, this plugin is your go-to tool for adding dynamic visuals and intelligent content to your projects.


✨ Key Features:


Search GIFs from Giphy: Quickly find and insert animated GIFs that perfectly match your design's tone and message. Simply type in a keyword, browse through a diverse selection, and bring your projects to life with eye-catching animations.


Access Stunning Images from Unsplash: Effortlessly search for high-quality, royalty-free images to complement your designs. With a vast library at your fingertips, you can find the perfect backdrop, illustration, or visual asset to enhance your creative work.


AI-Powered Content Suggestions from OpenAI: Harness the power of AI to generate descriptive text, taglines, or creative ideas directly within your Figma project. Just provide a prompt, and let OpenAI assist you in brainstorming and refining your design concepts.


⚡ How to Use

Search for GIFs or Images:


  1. Enter your keyword in the search bar.
  2. Browse the results and click on the one you love.
  3. Voila! It’s in your Figma design!


Generate AI Images:


  1. Use the AI image generator by providing a creative description.
  2. Watch as AI generates a unique visual based on your input.
  3. Add it directly to your Figma canvas and start designing!


🌟 Benefits of Using Our Plugin:


Boost Engagement: Add dynamic GIFs and captivating visuals that draw attention and keep users engaged.

Streamline Your Workflow: Access GIFs, images, and AI-generated content all in one place, saving you time and keeping you focused on your design work.

Inspire Creativity: Explore a variety of GIFs and images that spark new ideas and help you think outside the box.

User-Friendly Interface: Designed for ease of use, our plugin is perfect for designers of all skill levels.


🚀 Get Started Today! Transform your design workflow with the ultimate creative toolkit. Install our Figma plugin and unlock a world of GIFs, stunning images, and AI-powered suggestions that will take your projects to the next level.
plugins.tagline: Figma plugin that allows users to enhance their design project by easily searching.

plugins.name: Auto Select
plugins.description:
Auto Select is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow by providing advanced selection tools. With Auto Select, you can easily select objects by name and hierarchy, making it effortless to navigate and manipulate complex designs. Whether you're working on a small project or a large-scale design system, Auto Select is the perfect companion to enhance your productivity and creativity in Figma.


Key Features:


Select objects by name: Quickly find and select objects by entering their names.

Select parent and child layers: Navigate through the hierarchy of your design by selecting parent or child layers.

Undo selection: Easily undo selections to refine your choices.

Select all: Select all objects in your current Figma canvas with a single click.

Close plugin: Close the plugin window when you're done selecting objects.


You can select child layers of selected object and then parent layer of selected child layer .


How to Use:


Enter the name of the object you want to select in the input field.

Click on the "Select Object" button to select the object.

Use the other buttons to perform various selection actions, such as selecting all objects, selecting parent layers, selecting child layers, undoing selections, and closing the plugin.

Get Started with Auto Select today and take your Figma workflow to the next level!
plugins.tagline: "Effortless Selection, Seamless Design: Auto Select simplifies your Figma workflow."

Say goodbye to "Lorem Ipsum" and hello to MuCopy, the future of UX writing in Figma. Powered by GPT-4 and advanced language models, MuCopy is designed to transform the way you write and design user interfaces. Whether you're crafting tooltips, buttons, or entire dialogue boxes, MuCopy assists in generating concise, relevant, and engaging microcopy that fits perfectly into your designs.


Key Features:

  • AI-Driven Writing Assistant: Leverage the power of GPT-4 for generating creative, contextually relevant text.

Whether you're a UX writer, designer, or a team looking to streamline your design process, MuCopy is your go-to plugin for creating microcopy that resonates with users and elevates your designs.

plugins.name: dixma
plugins.description:
What is Dixma?

Dixma is a 4-12 player storytelling party game in Figma, inspired by the the card game Dixit.

Video Walkthrough (YouTube)


Game Board Required:

https://www.figma.com/community/file/889925301071649823


Game Rules

Each round all players have 6 random cards. The storyteller for the round shares a clue about one of their cards, and every other player picks their card that best fits the storyteller's story. The cards are revealed and all the players (other than the storyteller) guess which card they think is the storyteller's.


Scoring

If ALL players find the Storyteller’s card,

or NO players find the Storyteller’s card:

Storyteller: 0 points 
Other players: 2 points  


If at least one player but not all players find the card: 

Storyteller: 3 points 
Players who have found the card: 3 points 


In either case:

+1 bonus point per vote on your card if you
 are not the storyteller, up to 3 per round.


GitHub: https://github.com/brettlyne/dixma

accepted.name: Brett Holcomb
accepted.description: UX Engineer

plugins.name: Component Pro
plugins.description:
To improve my work efficiency, especially in mastering the Component, I made this plugin. It contains many enhancements for Figma’s Component and Instance features.


Just to be clear, I am not very good at HTML and TypeScript, some code was written by chatGPT, so welcome to feedback by sending mail to woshixwn@gmail.com.


Here is a detailed introduction to each function of the plugin.


Track Com/Ins

Change the current selection to correspond to the Component/Instance.

You need to select some instances or components first. For instances, run this function will change selection to their main components, but will not change viewport. For components, will select corresponding instances.

Of course, corresponding components/instances need to be in the same page.


Track Brothers

Find instances with the same main component.

Select Instances, and run this function, all instances that has the main component will be selected.

Be aware that if the page has many layers, it may take a lot of time.


Clone & Inherit

Batch replace layers with specific instance.

First, Select a component or an instance named “master”.

Second, select more layers.

Third, run the function, and the layers selected in 2nd step will replace to 1st step’s instance (create by component or clone by ‘master’ instance).

If you choose to select other instances in 2nd step, if it has the same properties as 1st step component/instance, replaced instance will keep the value.


Text2Instances

Batch replace text layers with specific instance.

This function is a lot like ‘’Clone & Inherit’, but the layers be replaced need to be text or a combination of texts.

For example, select a component which has 2 text properties, and select a frame contains 2 text layers, then run this function, the frame will be replace to instance created by component, with text properties being assigned to characters of those 2 text layers.


Fully Detach

Detach an instance and the instance inside

I think the description is simple enough, but just in case, let me give an example.

If you have an instance, it has 2 sub-layer, all is instance. Once you run this function, instance and its sub-instances will all be detached.

By the way, the layer that is hidden will be removed, otherwise it looks to mess.


Update ins Inside

Select all instances can be updated

Select some Frames, Groups, Components or even Instances first. Running this function will find out all instances belong to those that can be updated.

Noticed, It may take a long time to analysis each instance type sub-layers, I still try to improve that.


Comp Selection

Make selection a component

This function will make it a component by your selection, replace the selection with an instance that created by the new component.

Make sure that all selection are belong to the same parent.


--------


Next, some features may not exactly made for component, but they also useful(and I really don’t want to code another plugin).


Auto Rename

Rename selected layers and their sub-layers


Swap Layer

Exchange the position of selected layers


Make Max

Quickly set the size of selected layer to their parents’ size.


Sort Layer

Change the order in left side panel of selected layers by their position.


Perfect Corner

Quickly set selected layers’ independent corners to 60%(iOS like).


Round Pixel

Round layer’s position and width/height to Pixel


Adjust Outer Size

Adjust Component Set, Section, Frame’s size according to their sublayers.

I know Figma has its own official feature, but I made an adjustment, the adjust margin will choose the minimum value.



That's all for now, I guess.
plugins.tagline: Component, Instance, Enhancement

103754.release_notes:
I add some ux improvement in this version:

1. List item(Like 'Track Components') now is only enable when available layers are selected. For example, if you select a component, you can't click "Track Components" now. Reducing the risk to click wrong feature.
2. Split "Track Com/Ins" into 2 functions, Track Components and Track Instances. The reason is the same as above.
3. Add new feature, Clone Main Comp, it will clone main components of instances selected.
4. Update ins inside now has a loading state when analysis layers, cause it may take long time.
5. texts2instances now support nested instances
6. I add each function to menu's sub-menu, so you can use command+/ then type function name to quick execute it.

plugins.name: Custom Text Linter
plugins.description:
カスタム可能な用語一覧を元にテキストをチェックします。


テキストチェックの方法

  1. Figma、FigJam、Figma Slides 内でチェックしたいページを開きます。
  2. プラグインを起動し「ページをチェック」を押します。
  3. チェック結果が表示され、非推奨用語が含まれているレイヤーのリストが確認できます。
  4. 問題のある用語をクリックすると、該当するテキストレイヤーにフォーカスします。


用語一覧の更新方法

  1. 用語一覧を更新したい場合は「用語一覧の更新」 セクションを展開します。
  2. 用語一覧のCSVファイルを選択し、「CSVファイルをインポート」ボタンを押します。
  3. CSVには以下の列を含めます。
  4. recommended: 推奨される用語 （カンマ区切り）
  5. deprecated: 避けるべき用語 （カンマ区切り）
  6. message: 用語についての説明
  7. url: 参照リンク（任意）
  8. インポートが成功すると、ファイル名と日付が更新されます。


----


Checks text using a customizable term list.


How to Check Text

  1. Open the page you want to check in Figma, FigJam, or Figma Slides.
  2. Launch the plugin and click the “Check this page” button.
  3. The check results will be displayed, showing a list of text layers containing deprecated terms.
  4. Clicking on a flagged term will automatically focus on the corresponding text layer in the Figma page.


How to Update the Terms List

  1. If you want to update the terms list, expand the “Update Terms” section.
  2. Click the “Import CSV” button and select a CSV file containing the updated terms list.
  3. The CSV file should include the following columns:
  4. recommended: Preferred terms
  5. deprecated: Terms to avoid
  6. message: Explanation or corrective action
  7. url: Reference link (optional)
  8. Once the import is successful, the file name and date will be updated.

accepted.name: Shingo Suzuki
accepted.description:
Lead Designer / Interaction Designer
TSUMIKI INC.

plugins.tagline: Checks text using a customizable term list.

plugins.name: AI Page Manager
plugins.description:
AI Page Manager is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline your page management workflow. With this tool, you can effortlessly rename, add, delete, and reorder pages in your Figma file, all from a single, intuitive interface.


Key features:

1. Batch Rename: Quickly rename multiple pages at once.

2. Add Pages: Create new pages with custom names in just a few clicks.

3. Delete Pages: Remove unwanted pages easily and safely.

4. Reorder Pages: Drag and drop to rearrange your pages in any order you prefer.

5. Add Separators: Organise your pages with visual separators for better structure.

6. Refresh: Sync your plugin view with the latest changes in your Figma file.


How to use:

1. Open the plugin to see a list of all pages in your current Figma file.

2. To rename a page, simply type the new name in the input field next to the current page name.

3. To add a new page, click the "+" button and enter a name for your new page.

4. To delete a page, click the trash can icon next to the page you want to remove.

5. To reorder pages, drag and drop the pages into your desired sequence.

6. To add a separator, click the "Add Separator" button.

7. Once you've made your changes, click "Apply Changes" to update your Figma file.

8. Use the refresh button to sync the plugin with any external changes made to your file.


The AI Page Manager also includes a teaser for upcoming AI-powered features, hinting at future enhancements that will make your page management even more efficient.


Whether you're working on a small project or a complex design system with numerous pages, AI Page Manager helps you keep your Figma files organized and your workflow smooth. Say goodbye to tedious page management and hello to a more productive design process!
plugins.tagline: Easily rename, add, delete and reorder pages in your Figma file.

plugins.name: Sticky Status
plugins.description:
Status block for frames or components to assist in project status tracking and status note taking. This plugin allows you to add a block that is attached to your page/frame to allows you to set a status and leave comments/notes about the status.


The following statuses are supported currently:

  • Draft
  • In Progress
  • Ready for Review
  • Under Review
  • Approved
  • Ready for Development
  • Not Needed


NOTE: At this time, this plugin will not work with instances. Instances don't allow modification so the plugin is unable to add the status widget to the frame. In order to make this work, you can wrap your instance in a frame and then apply the status. You can add an auto-layout with all 0s for spacing and it will not impact the layout or design.
plugins.tagline: Sticky status blocks for frames and components.

plugins.name: Hexify
plugins.description:
Convert Color Collections into Code


Hexify helps you transform your Figma Color Collections into usable code - whether you're working with SCSS, CSS, or JSON. It's here to make your workflow a little easier, a little tidier, and a lot more fun.


Just pick your collections, choose a format, and click Generate Output. Your variables are ready to go.


🪄 Now with support for semantic color tokens — Hexify will follow references and fetch the actual colors for you.


🖤 Open-source & community-driven! Check out the code or contribute: https://github.com/ko-ko-lo/figma-color-exporter


💬 Feedback, ideas, or just want to say hi?

Drop a comment - I’d love to hear from you!

plugins.name: Flow Export PDF
plugins.description:
Easily export multiple Figma frames into a single PDF with clickable links! 🚀


How to Use:

1. Run the Plugin: Open the "uiexport" plugin.

2. Select Frames: Click and drag or Shift+click to select the frames you want to include in your PDF on the Figma canvas. 🖼️ The plugin window will show how many frames are selected.

3. Start Export: Click the "Export X Pages" button in the plugin window. ▶️

4. Processing: Wait while the plugin exports each frame and combines them into a PDF. You can track the progress (%) and see the status of each page (Exporting..., Processing PDF..., Completed). ⏳⚙️

5. Download: Once finished, the "Download PDF" button will appear. Click it to save your PDF file! 💾✅


✨ Features:

→ Exports multiple selected frames into one PDF.

→ Preserves clickable links (both URLs and links between exported frames). 🔗

→ Shows detailed progress and status for each frame.

→ Simple and clear interface.


Export your prototypes or presentations with interactive links effortlessly!
plugins.tagline: Interactive PDF exporter with multiple frames and clickable links.
